title: Booster Track
summaries: A Booster Track can be placed as a section of Minecart Track to automatically boost the speed of a Minecart that rides over it. The direction of the boost is indicated by the animated red arrow it displays, which can be toggled using a Hammer or Wire. The Booster Track is purchased from the Mechanic for 50 SC.Each booster will increase speed by 20mph, regardless of minecart variant.

statistics.Buy: 50 SC
statistics.Sell: 10 SC
